events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their vehicle and a roadside barrier on March 31st at approximately 8 PM.
Claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords and incident description provided during filing.
An agent specialized in vehicle collision claims has been assigned to manage this case and assist the customer.
The claim acknowledgment was sent to the insured with details about documentation required and next steps.
Request made for vehicle repair estimates, police report, and photos of the damaged car to proceed with the investigation.
The insured submitted all requested documentation including police report, repair shop estimates, and accident photos.
Investigation commenced to verify accident details and validate submitted documents for the claim processing.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident circumstances and damages match submitted documentation appropriately.
A settlement amount proposal has been sent to the insured based on the investigation findings and repair cost estimates.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the communication so far.
The claim approval was finalized following customer acceptance of the settlement and compliance with policy terms.
Payment corresponding to the approved settlement amount has been processed and transferred to the insured's account.
The claim has been officially closed after payment issuance and confirmation that no further actions are pending.
